com.robsonmartins.acaas.stt

Class STTResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.UniformResource
        • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
          • com.robsonmartins.acaas.AbstractResource
            • com.robsonmartins.acaas.JsonResource
              • com.robsonmartins.acaas.stt.STTResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    S2LibrasResource

    public class STTResource
extends JsonResource
    Servico REST para transformacao de Fala em Texto.

    speech (POST) - Arquivo de audio a ser convertido.
    lang - Idioma do texto.
    format - Formato do arquivo de audio.
    mode - Modo de retorno JSON.

    Author:
    Robson Martins (robson@robsonmartins.com)
